title: About
synopsis: It is not yet clear how to structure this documentation in wiki. Handlers should be documented on a stack by stack basis, with project sites listing the stacks and data-structures of the project.

title: Commands
synopsis: Here we list all the commands found in the [[LCW Project]]:

title: script_UpdateMenus
synopsis: This command parses and indexes any local or global menus it finds in a [[Livecode Object]].

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to a [[Federated Wiki]] site for documenting the handlers of the [[LCW Project]].
